Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc19
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController

Class SetupController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.GUIController
it.polimi.ingsw.gc19.View.GUI.SceneController.SetupController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LocalModelListener, Listener, SetupListener, StateListener, UI
public class SetupController extends GUIController implements SetupListener, StateListener, LocalModelListener
A scene controller. It handles setup phase for the game. It lets user choose his color, private goal card and the orientation of the initial card. Also, chat is available during this phase and user can see the other players' personal station

  • Constructor Details

    • SetupController

      public SetupController(GUIController controller)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      private void initialize()
      Initializes setup scene. First, it sets min width and height. Then, builds HBox used by players to choose their colors, goal card, initial card and info box. After that, sets width and height properties and load all sub-scenes with theirs controllers.

    • buildInfoHBox

      private void buildInfoHBox()
      Builds infoHBox: it contains all infos about user, game and other players state.

    • allPlayersConnectedFactory

      private void allPlayersConnectedFactory(boolean allPlayerConnected)
      Displays an image (tick or X) in infoHBox whether all players are connected to the game
      Parameters:
      allPlayerConnected - true if and only all players are connected to the game

    • buildInitialCardHBox

      private void buildInitialCardHBox()
      Builds initialCardHBox. When player chooses the orientation of his initial card, initialCardHBox vanishes and chat is resized to fill empty space.

    • buildPrivateGoalCardSelectionHBox

      private void buildPrivateGoalCardSelectionHBox()
      Builds privateGoalCardSelectionPane. When player chooses his private goal card, privateGoalCardSelectionPane vanishes and chat is resized to fill empty space.

    • buildAvailableColorsPane

      private void buildAvailableColorsPane()
      Builds availableColorsPane. When player chooses his color, availableColorsPane vanishes and chat is resized to fill empty space.

    • colorButtonFactory

      private ArrayList<javafx.scene.control.Button> colorButtonFactory(List<Color> availableColors)
      Factory method for pawns. Given a List<Color>, return the corresponding ArrayList of pawns buttons.
      Parameters:
      availableColors - the List<Color> of available colors
      Returns:
      the ArrayList<Button> built.

    • setBackgrounds

      private void setBackgrounds()
      Sets background to sub-scenes.

    • buildColorButton

      @NotNull private @NotNull javafx.scene.control.Button buildColorButton(Color c, javafx.scene.shape.Circle circlePawn)
      Builds a Button with which user can choose his Color. Buttons are clipped to circular.
      Parameters:
      c - the Color for which button has to be built
      circlePawn - the Circle with which color image is clipped
      Returns:
      the built Button

    • resizeChat

      private void resizeChat()
      Resizes chat to fill empty space on rightVBox.

    • notify

      public void notify(SetupEvent type)
      Used to notify SetupController with SetupEvent.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface SetupListener
      Parameters:
      type - a SetupEvent describing the type of the event

    • notify

      public void notify(SetupEvent type, String errorDescription)
      Used to notify SetupController with SetupEvent. An Alert is shown and availableColorsPane is rebuilt.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface SetupListener
      Parameters:
      type - the type of the error
      errorDescription - a String description of the error

    • notify

      public void notify(ViewState viewState)
      Used to notify SetupController about updates on ViewState. When GUIController.changeToNextScene(SceneStatesEnum) need to be called SetupController removes all listeners of its sub-scenes.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface StateListener
      Parameters:
      viewState - the new ViewState

    • notify

      public void notify(LocalModelEvents type, LocalModel localModel, String... varArgs)
      Used to notify SetupController about LocalModelEvents. infoHBox is rebuilt and a new Alert is shows. The popup last, only, for 5 seconds.
      Specified by:
      notify in interface LocalModelListener
      Parameters:
      type - a LocalModelEvents representing the event type
      localModel - the LocalModel on which the event happened
      varArgs - eventual arguments
